metadata.title: CVE-2021-20298 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - negligible
metadata.description: A flaw was found in OpenEXR's B44Compressor. This flaw allows an attackerwho can submit a crafted file to be processed by OpenEXR, to exhaust allmemory accessible to the application. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: openexr package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
